glsa.title: libapreq2: Denial of Service vulnerability
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability has been reported in libapreq2 which could lead to a Denial of Service.

background.p: libapreq is a shared library with associated modules for manipulating client request data via the Apache API.

description.p: A vulnerability has been reported in the apreq_parse_headers() and apreq_parse_urlencoded() functions of Apache2::Request.

impact.p: A remote attacker could possibly exploit the vulnerability to cause a Denial of Service by CPU consumption.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All libapreq2 users should upgrade to the latest version:
